ygData.subject: Holy Sword List attempt
ygData.msgSnippet: From my adventuring .. the Holy swords I have heard of in rumor or truth are the following ... Pearl Bladed Claymore (Everlore site has information on this
ygData.messageBody:
From my adventuring .. the Holy swords I have heard of in rumor or truth are the following ...

Pearl Bladed Claymore
(Everlore site has information on this

Ghoulbane
Damage: 15
Delay: 34
Type: 1H Slashing
Effect: Dismiss Undead
Weight: Unconfirmed, either 9.5 - 14.5
Note: If you are not worthy of wielding the sword (Not high enough level) you will receive the message: "You do not have the will to command this weapon."

Soulfire
No information recorded.

Fiery Avenger
Quest item
No other information recorded

Zweil
No information recorded.

Sword of Al'Akbakkar (sp) (While adventuring in "an Estate of Unrest" I saw over auctions this sword being sold for 900 platinum, and that it was a Holy Sword. No stats or anything else provided. This just may be a rumor .. just reporting what I saw.

No information recorded.


If anyone else cares to add to the list feel free to do so.

Dauldon Blackstone, humble dwarven Paladin of the Rathe server (20th)
